items.sentence: You\'d think they\'d tell Tom what he should do.
Tom wasn\'t surprised when Mary showed up early.
We need to buy candles for Tom\'s birthday cake.
I wish I could stay longer, but I have to leave.
I wish I could think of a good excuse not to go.
I wish I could understand why this is happening.
Tom needs to find a job to support his children.
Tom got in the car with Mary and they drove off.
Tom grew up in a small town not far from Boston.
I want to get a hat like the one Tom is wearing.
